summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Burke Avenue, from North Fortieth Street to North Forty-fifth Street; Wallingford Avenue; Densmore Avenue and Woodlawn Avenue, each from North Forty-second Street to North Forty-fifth Street; Ashworth Avenue, from North Forty-second Street to North Forty-third Street; Woodlawn Place, from Allen Place to North Forty-fifth Street; Interlake Avenue, from North Forty-second Street to North Forty-fourth Street; North Forty-third Street, from Interlake Avenue to Woodlawn Avenue; North Forty-fourth Street, from Interlake Avenue to Midvale Avenue; Allen Place, from Woodlawn Place to Midvale Avenue; North Forty-fifth Street, from Densmore Avenue to Midvale Avenue; North Forty-second Street, from Burke Avenue to Ashworth, Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by laying therein water mains of proper dimensions, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district; in accordance with Resolution No. 1283 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
